flawed_nl_solution:
First Jamie wants to figure out how many calories his father needs to lose from 5 pounds x 3500 calories each = <<5*3500=175000>>175000 calories to burn off.
Then Jamie needs to figure out how many calories his father will burn per day if he burns 2500 calories - eating 2000 calories = burning <<2500-2000=500>>500 calories a day.
If Jamie's father wants to burn off 175000 calories total at 500 calories a day, 175000 / 500 = <<175000/500=350>>350 days to burn off 5 pounds.
#### 350

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 17500, not 175000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
